name.jp: 竜王のマスク(女の子用)
name.vi: Mặt nạ của Rồng Cực phẩm (F)

description.en: A mask made of the scales and bones of a wise dragon. Refined by the earth.
description.ar: A mask made of the scales and bones of a wise dragon. Refined by the earth.
description.br: Uma máscara feita de escamas e ossos de um sábio dragão. Refinado pela terra.
description.cns: 用智慧龙的鳞片和骨头制成的面具。由大地精炼而成。
description.de: Eine Maske hergestellt aus Schuppen und Knochen eines weisen Drachen.
description.fi: A mask made of the scales and bones of a wise dragon. Refined by the earth.
description.fil: A mask made of the scales and bones of a wise dragon. Refined by the earth.
description.fr: Un masque fait des écailles et os d'un dragon sage, raffiné par la terre.
description.id: Topeng yang terbuat dari sisik dan tulang naga yang bijaksana. Disempurnakan oleh bumi.
description.it: A mask made of the scales and bones of a wise dragon. Refined by the earth.
description.jp: ドラゴンの鱗と骨から作られ、大地によって磨かれたマスク。
description.kr: 지혜로운 용의 비늘과 뼈로 만든 가면입니다. 대지에 의해 정제되었다.
description.nl: A mask made of the scales and bones of a wise dragon. Refined by the earth.
description.pl: A mask made of the scales and bones of a wise dragon. Refined by the earth.
description.ru: A mask made of the scales and bones of a wise dragon. Refined by the earth.
description.sp: Máscara hecha con escamas y huesos de un dragón sabio. Refinada por la tierra.
description.sw: A mask made of the scales and bones of a wise dragon. Refined by the earth.
description.th: หน้ากากที่ทำจากเกล็ดและกระดูกของมังกรที่ฉลาด ขัดเกลาด้วยดิน
description.tw: 用智慧龍的鱗片和骨頭製成的面具，由大地精煉而成。
description.vi: Một chiếc mặt nạ làm từ vảy và xương của một con rồng khôn ngoan. Do trái đất tinh luyện.
